name: Asha
desc:
Strange Monetoo that exhibit both a passion and talent for pigments. They can be found around the Easybreeze Holiday Resort and display an affinity for spiritual perception that is unusual among their kin from other regions — they can even be indwelt via Spiritspeaking.
When you indwell one, you will be able to throw paintballs forward to attack or as a means of painting. Hold to enter aiming mode.

imgDesc.text:
Strange Monetoo that exhibit both a passion and talent for pigments. They can be found around the Easybreeze Holiday Resort and display an affinity for spiritual perception that is unusual among their kin from other regions — they can even be indwelt via Spiritspeaking.
When you indwell one, you will be able to throw
paintballs forward to attack or as a means of painting. Hold to enter aiming mode.

Asha can dash in short bursts. Hold the dash button to choose the desired destination for your dash. You can also hold Jump to jump higher. When an Asha is in the air, you can hold to aim their
paintballs. While aiming, your Asha will remain suspended in midair until the next time you press the Jump button.
Asha can change the color of their paintballs at any time. They can also switch to "Invisicolor" paintballs that will remove any other colors they cover.
